item.name: Exchange Active Database Copy I/O: Reads (Attached) average latency
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Database Reads (Attached) Average Latency]

item.name: Exchange Active Logs I/O: Log threads waiting

item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Log Writes Average Latency]

item.name: Exchange Database: Database page fault stalls per second
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\Database Page Fault Stalls/sec]

item.name: Exchange Database: Log bytes writes per second
Exchange Database: Log record stalls per second
Exchange Information Store: User count
Exchange Information Store RPC Processing: RPC averaged latency
Exchange Information Store RPC Processing: RPC requests
Exchange Mailbox Assistants: Service state
Exchange Mail Submission: Service state
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages delivered to the store per second
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages queued for submission to transport from mailbox database
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages queued for submission to transport from public folder database
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages sent to transport per second
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages submitted by clients per second

item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Database Reads (Recovery) Average Latency]

item.name: Exchange Passive Database Copy I/O: Writes (Recovery) average latency
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Database Writes (Attached) Average Latency]

item.name: Exchange Passive Logs I/O: Log reads average latency
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Log Reads Average Latency]

item.name: Exchange Replication: Service state
Exchange RPC Client Throttling: RPCs failed: Server too busy
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchangeIS\Client: RPCs Failed: Server Too Busy]

item.name: Exchange Store Interface: RPC latency average
Exchange Store Interface: RPC requests outstanding
Exchange System Attendant: Service state
Exchange Throttling: Service state

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Mailbox:perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Database Reads (Attached) Average Latency].avg(300)}>20
trigger.name: Exchange Active Database Copy I/O: Reads (Attached) average latency greater than 20ms over the last 5 minutes

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Mailbox:perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Log Reads Average Latency].avg(300)}>200
trigger.name: Exchange Active Logs I/O: Log reads average latency greater than 200ms over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Active Logs I/O: Log record stalls greater than 10 per second over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Active Logs I/O: Log threads waiting greater than 10 over the last 5 minutes

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Mailbox:perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Log Writes Average Latency].avg(300)}>20
trigger.name: Exchange Active Logs I/O: Log writes average latency greater than 10ms over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Database: Database page fault stalls greater than 0 per second over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Database: Log bytes writes greater than 10000000 per second over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Database: Log record stalls greater than 10 per second over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Information Store RPC Processing: RPC averaged latency greater than 100ms over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Information Store RPC Processing: RPC requests greater than 70 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Mailbox Assistants service not running
Exchange Mail Submission service service not running

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Mailbox:perf_counter[\MSExchange Database(Information Store)\I/O Database Reads (Attached) Average Latency].avg(300)}>200
trigger.name: Exchange Passive Database Copy I/O: Reads (Recovery) average latency greater than 200ms over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Replication Service service not running
Exchange RPC Client Throttling: RPCs failed: Server too busy greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Store Interface: RPC latency average greater than 100ms over the last 5 minutes

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Mailbox:perf_counter[\MSExchange Store Interface(_Total)\RPC Requests outstanding].avg(300)}>0 & {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Mailbox:perf_counter[\MSExchange Store Interface(_Total)\RPC Requests outstanding].last()}<0
trigger.name: Exchange Store Interface: RPC requests outstanding greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange System Attendant service not running

graph.name: Exchange Information Store RPC Processing: RPC averaged latency
Exchange Information Store RPC Processing: RPC requests
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages delivered to the store per second
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages queued for submission to transport from mailbox database
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages queued for submission to transport from public folder database
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages sent to transport per second
Exchange Message Queuing: Messages submitted by clients per second
